Table 1. Crystal data and structure refinement for 1–2

|                 | 1                 | 2                 |
|-----------------|-------------------|-------------------|
| Formula         | C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>3</sub>BaNO<sub>5</sub> | C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>5</sub>BaNO<sub>6</sub> |
| Formula weight  | 318.43            | 336.46            |
| Crystal system  | Orthorhombic      | Triclinic         |
| Space group     | Pbca              | P-1               |
| a/Å             | 7.8328(11)        | 4.449(3)          |
| b/Å             | 9.5185(14)        | 9.583(6)          |
| c/Å             | 21.456(3)         | 12.124(8)         |
| α/°             | 90                | 97.645(10)        |
| β/°             | 90                | 98.778(11)        |
| γ/°             | 90                | 98.436(11)        |
| V/Å<sup>3</sup> | 1599.7(4)         | 498.9(6)          |
| Z               | 8                 | 2                 |
| ρ<sub>calcd</sub>/g cm<sup>−3</sup> | 2.644 | 2.240 |
| μ/mm<sup>−1</sup> | 4.958           | 3.989             |
| Collected reflections | 7831       | 4616              |
| Unique reflections | 1572           | 1965              |
| R(int)          | 0.0328            | 0.0314            |
| Final R indices [I > 2σ(I)] | 0.0914 | 0.0617 |
| Goodness-of-fit on F<sup>2</sup> | 1.12 | 1.03 |
